bool Sched::DSC_Scheduler::dumpAtha2DSC (  )  [private]
int Sched::DSC_Scheduler::schedule ( int  requestNbPartition,
RFO::Frame *  inputFrame,
PartitionSet &  realPart,
std::map< Partition, Site > &  fixed_sites 
) [virtual]

This method compute a partition number for each closure in the frame. This method should be implemented in derived class in order to provide a concrete algorithm for scheduling a data flow graph. The result of the scheduling is the partition number of each closure. The scheduler should take into account the constraints of mapping closure with OCR constraint and predefined site attribut.

Parameters:
requestNbPartition [in] the request number of partitions of the graph
inputFrame [in,out] the graph to partition
[out] realPart see sched_compildfg.h in method schedule for explanation
Returns:
the number of partitions computed by the algorithm, less or equal than requestNbPartition

Implements Sched::Scheduler.
